comments: Love Tracy! She is such a kind person, and truly cares about her students. Her classes were entertaining and informative. I would recommend Tracy to anyone. I enjoyed her class.
She\'s laid back and knows her stuff. Awesome teacher, represents Appalachian quite well. Take her class!
She\'s an awesome teacher!

I thought the class was fairly easy as long as you studied for the tests! She made all the material applicable and there were a few small assignments throughout the semester but as long as you did them then your grade was raised. I\'d recommend her!
She is a good teacher. I had no interest in science but she made it interesting and applicable. If you do all the assignments and look over notes before test you\'ll get an A.

Tracy is a great teacher! I am going into environmental engineering because of her! you can tell she is so passionate about what she talks about and she has a great way of presenting the material. Overall I learned a lot and it really was not much studying.

Tracy is an amazing professor - despite her large classes (120 students in mine) she makes a legitimate effort to get to know her students personally. She also makes an effort to make class interesting by showing videos and using humor in addition to her power points. I had no interest whatsoever in Bio before I had her but she did an excellent job
I had Tracy for 1102! She\'s a great person and a great professor! She keeps the class interesting with videos and relatable topics. You definitely have to study, but it\'s worth it!

I had her for bio 1102.she was an awesome and wonderful person in and outside of class! During class she has interesting and funny videos to help keep students interested and paying attention. Also she incorporates sustainability into some of the lectures which help inform students about many current energy and environmental crises! You will enjoy!
Tracy is awesome. She keeps you interested and actually wants you to pass. You don\'t have to be a biology genius to pass. Super fun too!

Tracy is great, I\'ve recommended her to everyone! She\'s unique and opinionated, but wants to open her student\'s eyes to things they may have not been aware of. Relates bio to real world issues. I am NOT a science student, but I went to every class and my lowest test grade was an 86%, minimal studying. Take her, pay attention-you\'ll do well.
Great teacher, I loved the class.
Loved having Tracy! She\'s a great teacher, open to new ideas and really passionate about the subject without pushing her beliefs on you. Tests are easy, information is clear --> take her if you can!

Her tests are not too hard, she gives yout he powerpoints from class on ASULearn..so friendly and open totalk about anything;she makes everything she does relevant to the class, she reaches you about actual life lessons and not just memorizing things! She tries to open your eyes to the world but does NOT push her opinions down your throat, take her

Tracy is awesome! She is super chill and enjoys what she teaches. Her tests are straight from the notes-if you go to class you will easily pass. Class was pretty interesting considering it\'s bio. Take her if you can!

She is my favorite teacher! I hate biology but she made it awesome!! If you have to take bio 100% take her and her only!! You are allowed to miss 6 days too! She is a very flexible kind women and she is super chill, she is hilarious.
Tracy is very down to earth. If you attend her class review the power points you will do well on exams. She has several assignments are great grade boosters! I would take her more of her classes.

This class was really easy.All of her info is on the powerpoints that she posts. 6 absences,she is opinionated but I would rather that than a drone. 5 Tests drops the lowest, I don\'t have to take the final or go the last two weeks because of her policies! take her!

Most annoying class I have ever taken, I have had an A the entire semester yet I still have to go to class because she takes attendance. All she does during class is tell stories and push her opinions on you. The only good thing about this class is that it\'s easy other than that it is a waste of time.

The only positive thing I can say is that she\'s easy. The entire class period literally all she does is push her agenda on you. Going to the farmer\'s market has nothing to do with the curriculum and yet it is a 30 point MANDATORY assignment. She is pointless and so is her class. Prepare to be constantly annoyed.
